message: I am looking for a non-technical cofounder to help me build and market my idea. I have a basic prototype and have a few ideas on where to go from here. Unfortunately I don't have the manpower to make it all work. Anyone wanting to help out, check out the demo at http://oim.ae/chatdemo and chat here or email me at v@oim.ae
thank you! Glad you like it. :)

Hey Vshlos - I really like your chat and I'm building a web app that can benefit from this. We are two girls and have been coding the site but I have a sales/marketing background. We're actually also looking for a technical co-founder who is a guy. add me to Twitter. i'm lienista or email me: lqnguyen at gmail. what framework are you using?
I'm curious what are seeking a cofounder for?
Why am i seeking a cofounder? Because i simply don't have that much marketing and sales experience. Also because I don't have enough time to try to build it and sell it at the same time.
